info.name: Lodgify V3/V4 Reviews API
info.description:
This collection contains examples of the CURD opertations from the [Logify](https://www.lodgify.com/) APIs that manipulate reviews. They are not public. They could change. This is what I observed in May 2025.

The requests make use of a view variables

- **AUTH_TOKEN** - This is the `Bearer` token that authorizes the API calls. Pull it from your browser interactions with [https://app.lodgify.com/reviews/website.](https://app.lodgify.com/reviews/website.) Use this token in the `Authorization` section as a `Bearer` token.
    
- **PROP_ID** - This is the `int32` identifier of the property that your reviews are asociated with. Find it in [https://app.lodgify.com/rentals-list](https://app.lodgify.com/rentals-list)
    
- **REVIEW_ID** - This is the `int32` identifier of an individual review returned from the list and create APIs and used on edit, get and delete.
